name: S.O.S. Artist In Distress
description: What Else can I say? I am recording this point of desperation by minting this certificate of awesomeness and letter of grattitude. At the amount in tezos needed given the current exchange rate with USD to pay off all my debt, and get my life started properly again after my divorce is final on the 30th of April, 2021. I do not expect anyone to actually be quite this awesome, just to make a public statement about how life sucks sometimes and to perhaps warn younger artist to try and be responsible
